name: Indra Industries
overview:
Established in the year of 2010, we, “Indra Industries Ltd.”, are counted amongst the leading manufacturer and supplier of HDPE and PP Bags. As per the industry requirements, we are offering HDPE Fertilizer Bag, Laminated Woven Bag, HDPE Laminated Woven Bag, PP Woven Laminated Gusseted Bag and Gusseted Paper Bag.

Our Team: Engineers Managers Warehousing and packaging professionals Sales and marketing executives Quality auditors

Our Quality: Quality of HDPE and PP Bags, manufactured, supplied and traded by us, is prime factor to which we pay utmost attention. It is in the core of our business operations since our establishment. We follow a strict quality policy in all the processes and at each steps.

Client Satisfaction: We are recognized as a client centric organization engaged in manufacturing, supply and trade HDPE and PP Bags. Utmost client satisfaction is the main goal of our organization and strive to achieve it on every stage of our business.

Why Us?: With our expertise in designing and manufacturing of rollers and other products, we have successfully been able to garner satisfactory clientele in the industry.
